firstNightReminder: If the closest evil player is in a clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the closest player is in an anti-clockwise direction, point your finger horizontally in that direction. If the two closest evil players are equidistant, point your finger horizontally in either direction.
name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: Once the wish has been made, choose a price to balance the effects of the wish, and give a clue that helps good players identify what the wish is about. When the Wizard dies, the effects of their wish are still in play.
otherNightReminder: Once the wish has been made, choose a price to balance the effects of the wish, and give a clue that helps good players identify what the wish is about. When the Wizard dies, the effects of their wish are still in play.
name: Wizard
ability: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

firstNightReminder: If tonight equals the number of Outsiders in play when the game began, all Townsfolk players are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned players are no longer poisoned. If tonight equals the number of Outsiders in play when the game began, all Townsfolk players are poisoned.
name: Xaan
ability: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk or not.
